data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V., Matov, Alexey Yu., Chen, Liusheng (2016): Some taxonomic notes on the Caradrina (Eremodrina) filipjevi (Boursin, 1936) species group (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae). Zootaxa 4200 (2): 340-344, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.2.10|10 occurrences
